ResearchProjectDef.label: Screwball generator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Harness the power of a pony supposedly cursed by the Lord of Chaos for your own needs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Plushie recycling
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to reclaim some of the material used to make plushies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Herbal cure kit
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to make a herbal remedy which will cure a person of a variety of afflictions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Rainbow Laser
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create weapons that smite your enemies with the power of rainbows.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Statues of the Evil Sisters
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to construct a statue of Nightmare Moon, who will grant you exotic items in exchange for silver, as well as a statue of Daybreaker, who will allow you to convert metals using chemfuel.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Nightmare Moon allows you to request many exotic items using silver, though it does work out to be more expensive than acquiring them normally, while Daybreaker lets you convert materials using chemfuel.\n\nPlease note that some recipes at these buildings are locked behind research; check back often to see if anything new is available.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Request skilltrainers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Nightmare Moon will grant you the ability to request skilltrainers from her.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Magic mirror
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the secrets of the magic mirror which connects Equestria to a whole other world.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Magical power efficiency
ResearchProjectDef.description: Improves the electricity generated or used by pony-themed buildings.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
These buildings now generate more power:

- Screwball: +50%
- Magic mirror: +25%

These buildings now use less power:

- Plushie bench: -50%
- Fabric Exchange: -50%
- Stone Exchange: -50%
- Sweetie Bot turret: -25%
- Nurse Redheart: -25%
- Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000: -25%

ResearchProjectDef.label: Request archotech items
ResearchProjectDef.description: Nightmare Moon will allow you to request archotech items from her.
